string.value: Shoot the dealer?
|What was that? The dealer had every chance to win...
|He always knew the order in which he loaded the shotgun shells...
|If he had played dishonestly, would the game have ended differently?
|It doesn't matter. I just need to accept the fact that for me... It was... success...
|I was trying to win. I used items. All my actions have led me to... success.
|But I want to... Taste luck!
|@ffc10000I WANT. TASTE. PURE. LUCK.
|@ffc10000DO YOU LIKE GAMBLING?
|@ffc10000THE RULES OF THE GAME ARE SIMPLE.

@ffc10000THE SHOTGUN ON THE TABLE IS REAL. @ffc10000WE TAKE TURNS SHOOTING AT EACH OTHER.|@ffc10000I'VE RUN OUT OF LIVES - WE'RE PLAYING THE NEXT ROUND. @ffc10000YOU'VE RUN OUT OF LIVES - YOU'RE DEAD.|@ffc10000YOU CAN SEE THE INFORMATION AT THE TOP OF YOUR SCREEN.
|@ffc10000LET'S START.|@ffc10000THE GAME GETS MORE INTERESTING EVERY ROUND.
|@ffc100001 LIVE SHELL. 2 BLANKS.
|@ffc10000I LOAD THEM IN RANDOM ORDER. REMEMBER, I ALWAYS PLAY FAIR.
|@ffc10000THE FIRST MOVE AFTER LOAD ALWAYS YOURS.|@ffc10000YOU SHOOT YOURSELF WITH A BLANK, I MISS MY TURN. CHOOSE.
|@ffc100003 LIVE SHELLS. 2 BLANKS.
|@ffc10000YOU KNOW THE RULES.
|@ffc10000LET'S MAKE THE GAME A LITTLE MORE INTERESTING.
|@ffc10000THREE ITEMS EACH.|@ffc10000NEW ITEMS BEFORE EVERY LOAD.
|@ffc10000NOW IS THE LAST ROUND.
@ffc10000NO MORE RESURRECTIONS NOW. IT'S JUST YOU AND I. AT DEATH'S DOOR.| |@ffc10000MONEY FOR THE WINNER AND DEATH AS A REWARD FOR THE LOSER.
